byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: RLM Finsbury has hired Edward Adler as a partner. Mr. Adler, who was previously a head of corporate communications at Time Warner, is the first prominent addition by the public relations firm since it was formed by a merger this year.
snippet: RLM Finsbury has hired Edward Adler as a partner. Mr. Adler, who was previously a head of corporate communications at Time Warner, is the first prominent addition by the public relations firm since it was formed by a merger this year.
lead_paragraph: RLM Finsbury said on Tuesday that it had hired Edward Adler as a partner. Mr. Adler, who was previously a head of corporate communications at Time Warner, is the first prominent addition by the public relations firm since it was formed by the merger this year of Robinson Lerer & Montgomery and the Finsbury Group of Britain. headline.main: RLM Finsbury Hires Its First Post-Merger Partner
